mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_BLOG B USING (MEMBER_ID) WHERE BLOG_ID = #{blogId}
SELECT MEMBER_ID, EMAIL, NICKNAME, BIRTH_AT, PHONE, GENDER, HEIGHT, WEIGHT FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBER_DETAIL USING (MEMBER_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME, M.GENDER, B.GRADE FROM TB_MEMBER M LEFT JOIN TB_BLOG B ON B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT FOLLOWED_MEMBER_ID FROM TB_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) AND M.IS_DELETED = 'N'
SELECT WEIGHT, HEIGHT, BIRTH_AT, GENDER FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBER_DETAIL USING (MEMBER_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
